section: The term of this Agreement (the Term) shall commence as of April 1, 2018 (the Effective Date) and shall expire upon the later of: (a) the conclusion of the 2022/23 NFL season and (b) the last day in February, 2023 (such expiration date, the Scheduled Expiration Date), unless sooner terminated pursuant to the terms of this Agreement.
explanation: The expiration date is ambiguous. The 2022/2023 NFL season concludes in February 2023. Therefore, stating the agreement expires at the end of the 2022/2023 NFL season AND the last day in February 2023 is redundant. Also, the agreement may be terminated sooner than the expiration date.

section: Sponsor shall pay Club the Annual Fee for each Contract Year of this Agreement in six (6) equal installments, each due on or prior to the 1st of each month between June and November of the applicable Contract Year.
explanation: This statement outlines the payment schedule for the annual fee. It states that the payment is due on or prior to the 1st of each month, which is not consistent and has a structural flaw.

section: If any portion of the Annual Trade Value is not used in any given Contract Year, such unused amount shall carry forward to the subsequent Contract Year. If any portion of the Annual Trade Value is not used at the end of the Term, Club shall be permitted to use such unused amount within twelve (12) months following expiration of this Agreement.
explanation: The statement defines what happens if the Annual Trade Value is not used in any given contract year, and at the end of the term, however, it is missing what will happen if the sponsorship agreement is terminated early.
